author: cbs8
title: MEDIA ALERT: Fourth Annual "HoliDay of Play"
text:
The Toy Insider
Fun, Hands-on Event with Over 80 of the Hottest Toys of the Season on Display
Friday, October 16; 11:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m.
NEW YORK , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The fourth annual HoliDAY of Play event will take place Friday, October 16 , in partnership with The Toy Insider and Woman's Day magazine. The highly anticipated event is recognized as the biggest day in holiday PLAY, offering attendees and media the unique opportunity to rediscover their inner child and play with this year's hottest toys.
Toys from The Toy Insider's Hot 20, Top Tech 12 and STEM 10 will be on display as well as a variety of toys from some of the biggest names in the toy industry, such as Hasbro, Spin Master, Hexbug, Jakks Pacific, and more. The event will also feature a presentation on the leading toy trends for 2015 by The Toy Insider Mom, Laurie Schacht .
The event will take place on the 44th floor of the Hearst Building. Not only does this exclusive space hold some of the most spectacular views of Central Park and the New York City skyline, but attendees will also get the chance to enjoy a gourmet brunch.
Follow us on Twitter at: #HoliPlay
Where : Hearst Building
300 West 57 th Street (at corner of 8 th Avenue)
44 th Floor
New York City
When: Friday, October 16
11:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m.
RSVP Required
Contact : Jessica Reda, LKPR, Inc.
Jessica@LKPublicRelations.com
646-484-4577
About The Toy Insider
The Toy Insider, the go-to source for toy and children's product information, publishes a holiday gift guide by age category annually in Woman's Day magazine, and is a trusted resource for parents both online and through social media all year long. Its content is produced by an editorial team with more than 30 years of experience covering the children's products industry. The Toy Insider is published by Adventure Publishing Group, publisher of leading trade publications The Toy Book, The Toy Report, The Licensing Book and Total Licensing Report. For more information, visit TheToyInsider.com and keep up with The Toy Insider news on Twitter , YouTube , Instagram and Facebook .
